TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GetManifestCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

summary.span: 为 的 事件提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for the event of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下载部署和应用程序清单[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]后, 使用获取有关应用程序的信息。Use to obtain information about a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application after the deployment and application manifests have been downloaded. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用以编程方式在客户端计算机上[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]安装应用程序。The following code example shows how to use to install a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application programmatically on a client machine. [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ActivationContext As ActivationContext
public: property ActivationContext ^ ActivationContext { ActivationContext ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序的上下文。

span.span: Gets the context for the current [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示当前应用程序的上下文。

span.span: An object representing the context for the current application.

public: property ApplicationIdentity ^ ApplicationIdentity { ApplicationIdentity ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets a description of the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
An object.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ApplicationManifest As XmlReader
public: property System::Xml::XmlReader ^ ApplicationManifest { System::Xml::XmlReader ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取用于此部署的 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序清单。

span.span: Gets the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application manifest for this deployment.
An representing the application manifest.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用此变量从应用程序清单中获取所需的任何信息, 例如依赖项列表、信任信息等。You can use this variable to grab any information you need from the application manifest, such as a list of dependencies, trust information, and so on. 有关此文档的结构的详细信息, 请参阅[ClickOnce 应用程序清单](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29570cec-4e53-4660-a850-abc4fa150243)。For more information on the structure of this document, see [ClickOnce Application Manifest](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29570cec-4e53-4660-a850-abc4fa150243). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在事件处理程序中检查应用程序清单, 以确定默认情况下应用程序是否需要完全信任。The following code example shows how to examine an application manifest from within a event handler to determine whether the application requires full trust by default. [!code-csharp[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/CS/Form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Deployment.Application.InPlaceHostingManager/VB/Form1.vb#5)]
